sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.demand_management" name="Demand Management" version="1.0.0" invalidate_properties="true" provider_name="ServiceNow" onload_demo_data="load_dependent_demo_data.js" state="published" type="application" help="Demand Management" licensable="true" license_model="producer"> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.process_flow_formatter" /> <import plugin="com.snc.assessment_core" /> <import plugin="com.snc.timeline_visualization" /> <import plugin="com.snc.bubblechart_workbench" /> </requires> <description>The Demand Management application aids with capturing the demand and provide tools to screen, assess and prioritize it. Only upgrade is allowed for this plugin. Activation should be done through Project Portfolio Suite with Financials plugin.</description> <no_activate>true</no_activate> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>The Demand Management application aids with capturing the demand and provide tools to screen, assess and prioritize it. Only upgrade is allowed for this plugin. Activation should be done through Project Portfolio Suite with Financials plugin.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Demand Management</help> <id>com.snc.demand_management</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Demand Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.demand_management/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.process_flow_formatter,com.snc.assessment_core,com.snc.timeline_visualization,com.snc.bubblechart_workbench</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.demand_management</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
